fields.label: Main Content Flex
fields.name: main_content_flex
fields.instructions: Use this to add/edit elements from your pages.

sub_fields.label: Featured Products
sub_fields.message:
To add featured products, go to "Products" and click the star to make it featured.

Note: This field will not appear if woocommerce is not installed as a plugin.

sub_fields.label: Note
sub_fields.message: This field will not appear if woocommerce is not installed as a plugin.

sub_fields.label: Button Text
sub_fields.name: button_text
sub_fields.instructions: The text that will display on the button under the featured product. EG. "Buy Now".

sub_fields.label: Show Prices
sub_fields.name: show_prices
sub_fields.instructions: Show the price. If the price is not entered, a price will not display regardless of the value selected here.

sub_fields.label: Content
sub_fields.name: content
sub_fields.instructions:
Each content block added will appear inline and take up equal amounts of the screen. 

Recommend a max of 4 content blocks.

sub_fields.label: Content Block
sub_fields.name: content_item
sub_fields.instructions:
Input text, images or other content. Should primarily be just text and maybe an image or two.

Note: To avoid potentially harming your SEO, do not use 'Heading 1' text style.

sub_fields.label: Image
sub_fields.name: image
sub_fields.instructions: Note: Image must be a minimum of 1200px x 800px

sub_fields.label: Call to Action
sub_fields.name: call_to_action
sub_fields.instructions: Enable this to change the slider to a sliding call of action.

sub_fields.label: Navigation
sub_fields.name: navigation
sub_fields.instructions: Tick to enable the left/right navigation.

sub_fields.label: Cards
sub_fields.name: cards
sub_fields.instructions: All cards added here will be aligned in a single row. The cards will have equal widths to fit.

sub_fields.label: Number Posts
sub_fields.name: number_posts
sub_fields.instructions: Number of posts to display in a row.
